synopsis.text:
Antarctica has become the epicenter of a nefarious plot by rogue scientist Jung Zorndyke, who seeks to overthrow human dominance and establish a new world order of aquatic mutants. As the Earth's water levels surge, swallowing land and lives, the remnants of humanity unite under the banner of the Blue Fleet, with the legendary Blue Submarine No. 6 leading the charge.

The fate of mankind now hinges on the collaboration between the Blue Fleet and the enigmatic Hayami Tetsu, a submarine pilot unrivaled in skill. Kino Mayumi, a dedicated young pilot, embarks on a mission to recruit Tetsu, only to be met with rejection. However, destiny intervenes, forcing the duo to join forces amidst escalating tensions between humans and the mutated sea creatures.

In this thrilling anime, the Blue Fleet's crew must confront Zorndyke's malevolent ambitions and the treacherous depths of the ocean to save humanity from the brink of extinction. Will they succeed in quelling the rising tides and restoring balance to the world, or will Zorndyke's vision of an aquatic utopia become a chilling reality?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
